DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effect of a light meal on the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of aliskiren in patients with mild to moderate hypertension.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Light Meal on Pharmacokinetic and Pharmacodynamics of Aliskiren in Patients With Mild to Moderate Hypertension
DOC.criteria: Male or female outpatients, 18 to 65 years of age with mild to moderate hypertension Patients who are eligible and able to participate in the study Exclusion criteria: Severe hypertension Secondary form of hypertension. Type 1 or type 2 diabetes mellitus Serum potassium out side laboratory reference range Any history of hypertensive encephalopathy or cerebrovascular accident Other protocoldefined inclusion/exclusion criteria may apply
